mapper.select: /* 주소록 목록을 가져온다. */ SELECT c.contact_id , c.name , c.phone_number , c.email , c.address , DATE_FORMAT(c.registered_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS registered_datetime , DATE_FORMAT(c.last_updated_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS last_updated_datetime FROM CONTACT AS c

/* 해당 ID에 속하는 주소록 상세정보를 가져온다. */ SELECT c.contact_id , c.name , c.phone_number , c.email , c.address , DATE_FORMAT(c.registered_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS registered_datetime , DATE_FORMAT(c.last_updated_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS last_updated_datetime FROM CONTACT AS c WHERE c.contact_id = #{contact_id}
